summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing agreements with the United States of America and Columbia Storage Power Exchange, for purchase by the city of a portion of the Canadian entitlement to electric energy under the Treaty between the United States of America and Canada relating to the Cooperative Development of the Water Resources of the Columbia River Basin and authorizing an escrow agreement and consent to a "Direction for Payments to Trustee" in connection therewith.
